instructions: For this task, you'll have to learn a shopping list and the prices of the items on that list. There are two phases to this task...
During the first phase, please judge whether the price listed beneath each shopping item is a good price for the item.
During the second phase, you will be asked to touch which of two possible prices was associated with the shopping item in the first phase.
phase2only_instructions: Over the previous week you have learnt some shopping lists and prices of the items on those lists
